name: Pickled Swiss Chard Stems
recipeYield: 6 or more servings as a condiment or in salad
keywords: cider vinegar, swiss chard, vegetable stock, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Cut stems in pieces 1/2-inch wide and 2 inches long. Place in saucepan with stock and bay leaf, and simmer 10 minutes, until tender. Drain, and place in shallow glass or ceramic dish with bay leaf.
Mix oil and vinegar together, and pour over chard stems. Season with sugar, salt and pepper. Refrigerate, and allow to marinate overnight and up to four days before serving.
